00058   void processOptions(UserServer userServer, const UMS_Data::ListAuthSysOptions_ptr& options, std::string& sqlRequest) {
00059 
00060 
00061     mfullInfo = options->isListFullInfo();
00062     //If the full option is defined, the user must be an admin
00063     if (mfullInfo) {
00064       if(!userServer.isAdmin()) {
00065       UMSVishnuException e (ERRCODE_NO_ADMIN);
00066       throw e;
00067       }
00068     }
00069 
00070     if (options != NULL) {
00071       std::string  userId = options->getUserId();
00072       if(userId.size()!=0) {
00073         //If the user is an admin
00074         if(userServer.isAdmin()) {
00075           checkUserId(userId);
00076           sqlRequest.append(" and authsystemid IN (SELECT authsystemid from authsystem, users,"
00077                             "authaccount where userid='"+userId+"'"
00078                             "and authaccount.authsystem_authsystemid=authsystem.numauthsystemid and authaccount.users_numuserid=users.numuserid)"
00079                             );
00080         }//End If the user is an admin
00081         else {
00082           UMSVishnuException e (ERRCODE_NO_ADMIN);
00083           throw e;
00084         }
00085       }
00086 
00087       std::string  authSystemId = options->getAuthSystemId();
00088       if(authSystemId.size()!=0) {
00089         //To check if the authSystem identifier is correct
00090         checkAuthSystemId(authSystemId);
00091         addOptionRequest("authsystemid", authSystemId, sqlRequest);
00092       }
00093 
00094       //If the option for listing all authSystem has not defined
00095       if (!options->isListAllAuthSystems()) {
00096         //If the option userId has not
00097         if ((userId.size() == 0) && (authSystemId.size() == 0)) {
00098           sqlRequest.append(" and authsystemid IN (SELECT authsystemid from authsystem, users,"
00099                             "authaccount where userid='"+userServer.getData().getUserId()+"'"
00100                             "and authaccount.authsystem_authsystemid=authsystem.numauthsystemid and authaccount.users_numuserid=users.numuserid)"
00101                             );
00102         }
00103       }
00104     }
00105     else {
00106       sqlRequest.append(" and authsystemid IN (SELECT authsystemid from authsystem, users, "
00107                         "authaccount where userid='"+userServer.getData().getUserId()+"'"
00108                         "and authaccount.authsystem_authsystemid=authsystem.numauthsystemid and authaccount.users_numuserid=users.numuserid)"
00109       );
00110     }
00111   }

00119   UMS_Data::ListAuthSystems* list() {

00121   std::string sqlListofAuthSystems = "SELECT authsystemid, name, uri, authlogin, authpassword, userpwdencryption, authtype, status, ldapbase from authsystem, ldapauthsystem "
00122                                      " where ldapauthsystem.authsystem_authsystemid = authsystem.numauthsystemid ";

00128 
00129   //Creation of the object user

00133   if (userServer.exist()) {
00134 
00135     processOptions(userServer, mparameters, sqlListofAuthSystems);

00140       for (size_t i = 0; i < ListofAuthSystems->getNbTuples(); ++i) {
00141         results.clear();
00142         results = ListofAuthSystems->get(i);
00143         ii = results.begin();
00144         UMS_Data::AuthSystem_ptr authSystem = ecoreFactory->createAuthSystem();
00145         authSystem->setAuthSystemId(*ii);
00146         authSystem->setName(*(++ii));
00147         authSystem->setURI(*(++ii));
00148         std::string authLogin(*(++ii));
00149         std::string authPassword(*(++ii));
00150         int userPasswordEncryption(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00151         int type(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00152         if (mfullInfo) {
00153           authSystem->setAuthLogin(authLogin);
00154           authSystem->setAuthPassword(authPassword);
00155           authSystem->setUserPasswordEncryption(userPasswordEncryption);
00156           authSystem->setType(type);
00157         }
00158         authSystem->setStatus(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00159         authSystem->setLdapBase(*(++ii));
00160         mlistObject->getAuthSystems().push_back(authSystem);
00161         }
00162     }
00163   }
00164   else {
00165     UMSVishnuException e (ERRCODE_UNKNOWN_USER);
00166     throw e;
00167   }
